content.en: MIMO Algorithm Optimization: Researchers are investigating various algorithms to improve the performance and complexity of MIMO (Multiple-Input Multiple-Output) systems. These algorithms, such as the multistage sphere decoding algorithm, sphere decoding and synchronization algorithms, and fixed-complexity sphere decoder, aim to overcome the complexity and sequential nature of the sphere decoder, reduce the complexity of MIMO systems, and provide near optimal performance. By implementing these algorithms, researchers hope to enhance the error probability, implementation aspects, and overall performance of MIMO systems.
content.da: Optimering af MIMO-algoritmer: Forskere undersøger forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre ydeevnen og kompleksiteten af MIMO (Multiple-Input Multiple-Output) systemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom multistage-sfære-dekodningsalgoritmen, sfære-dekodnings- og synkroniseringsalgoritmer, og fast-kompleksitets-sfære-dekoder, sigter mod at overvinde kompleksiteten og den sekventielle karakter af sfære-dekoderen, reducere kompleksiteten af MIMO-systemer, og levere næsten optimal ydeevne. Ved at implementere disse algoritmer håber forskerne at forbedre fejlsandsynligheden, implementeringsaspekterne og den samlede ydeevne af MIMO-systemer.
